project_abstract.cdata: The Road Improvement Project will support three principal road-related Government objectives: enhancing transport efficiency; expanding traffic capacity; and increasing traffic safety. The project includes the following components: (i) paving, upgrading and widening 270 km of the national road system; (ii) establishment of a new road maintenance management system including periodic maintenance; (iii) implementation of selected aspects of the national road safety program; and (iv) the provision of equipment, consultant services, and training and equipment for road sector development.

P004154.docty: Project Completion Report,Loan Agreement,Staff Appraisal Report
